last_episode_to_air.name: Whiskey Lake Dozer
last_episode_to_air.overview: Winter is coming, and it’s a race to squeeze in as much work as possible before business dies down for the season.

name: Big Fix Alaska
overview: Big Fix Alaska chronicles the wild adventures of a full service master mechanic shop that takes on high-risk jobs across the frozen Tundra. Risking life and limb on every job, this charismatic 10+ man team of Alaska roughnecks brave the elements and work around the clock repairing super machines under the harshest conditions and in the most remote places in the world.

episodes.name: Long gone on the Yukon
episodes.overview: The mechanics at Jim’s Equipment Repair go out in the field to fix three large machines, but they must overcome lost luggage and other challenges.

episodes.name: Kill Drill
episodes.overview: Jim and Austin attempt to save a town from starvation. Aven returns to his roots to fix a mid-century Nodwell being used to drill seismic test holes.

episodes.name: Treading water
episodes.overview: When a financial crisis hits Jim’s Equipment Repair, the team bands together to tackle jobs on land and sea in hopes of making payroll.

episodes.name: Muddying the water
episodes.overview: In this episode of Big Fix Alaska, Jim hires Duane’s archnemesis Todd Anderson and then goes on an adventure to fix a hydro-locked Thiokol Snow cat.

episodes.name: Frankendozer
episodes.overview: A high volume of jobs force the team at Jim’s Equipment Repair to divide and conquer, including getting a whole town’s power back up and running.

episodes.name: Gravel to the finish line
episodes.overview: The team takes on repairs of a fishing vessel and large-haul truck, even as tensions mount at the shop over jobs that are slipping through the cracks.

episodes.name: Whiskey Lake Dozer
episodes.overview: Winter is coming, and it’s a race to squeeze in as much work as possible before business dies down for the season.
